content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

Respond to parts a, b, and c.

Describe one cause for the development of the Cold War in the mid-1900s.

Explain one way in which the Cold War affected Europe in the second half of the 1900s.

Explain one reason why the Cold War ended in the late 1900s.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
